name: Puzzles All the Way Down
description:
A simple but endless 3D puzzle game

In this game, it’s really Puzzles All the Way Down! As soon as you solve the puzzles to open a box, the next box with puzzles is found inside of it. The puzzles are generated in a modular way, so you may need to open a few boxes to see all possible arrangements.

Controls

Use the mouse to move around the box, click and drag on objects to move or use them. That’s it!

How the game was made

I used Blender for modeling and Unity for the actual game.

At first I was dissatisfied with the theme, but then I had the Idea of making a cube with lots and lots of puzzles on it, which you have to solve to get deeper and deeper into the cube. I didn’t have enough time to put all the features I had in mind into the game, but at least I got three types of puzzles working, which is (I hope) enough to get the idea across.
